info.name: SmartCampus Unified App API
info.description: Complete API collection for Unified Teacher-Guardian Mobile App with RESTful URLs

request.description: Login endpoint that works for both teachers and guardians. Returns user_type in response to determine app flow.
Get user profile - returns different data based on user role (teacher/guardian)
Get dashboard data based on user role - teacher stats or guardian dashboard
Get today's classes (teacher) or today's schedule (guardian)
Get quick stats based on user role

body.raw:
{
    "title": "Math Exercise 5.2",
    "description": "Complete all problems from page 45-47",
    "subject_id": 1,
    "class_id": 1,
    "due_date": "2026-02-10",
    "instructions": "Show all working steps"
}

item.name: RESTful Endpoints (NEW)
item.description: New RESTful URL structure with student_id in path. Use these for new development.

request.description: Get student attendance records for a specific month
Get exam performance trends with analysis
Get detailed results for a specific exam
Submit homework with notes and photos
Get detailed class information with students and teachers
Get all fee records with pagination
Get fee structure with payment methods and overdue fees
Get leave requests with status filter
Create leave requests for multiple consecutive days
Get curriculum chapters, topics, and progress tracking for subject
